title: The Future Of Algorithmic Personalization | TechCrunch
excerpt: Personalization algorithms influence what you’ve chosen yesterday, what you choose today and what you’ll be choosing tomorrow. Simultaneously, there seems to be something wrong with personalization. We are continuously bumping into obtrusive, uninteresting ads. Our digital personal assistant isn’t that personal at all. We’ve lost friends to the algorithmic abyss of the News feed. The content we encounter online seems to repeat the same things again and again.

title: Curation and Algorithms
